title: i need help
body: i cant find in the store menu how to mystery gift myself. where is it?

replies.body:
Hey fum422,

The Self Mystery Gifting period expired at midnight on February 2, 2016. Keep an eye out for future opportunities where the feature comes back!

>UPDATE: Due to Self-Mystery Gifting expiring earlier than planned, we have extended the feature until February 2, 11:59 AEDT.

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/self-mystery-gifting-live
